attributes.action: I want to normalise teachers who understand the pressures of school
attributes.additional_details: I want to have teachers who understand the pressures of school and stop shouting in class and calmly remove people or deal with things in a way that doesn’t make children stress out about making a mistake and encourages good learning habits of being polite I want to cal this the vaughton law as from personal experience there is one teacher who does this and they are the most loved teachers who people aspire to be
attributes.background: I want there to be a new regimen to get teachers to stop shouting in classes and calmly deal with things

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to school culture, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
